job_description:
• Join our 30,000 everyday heroes.
• A global technology and professional services company that delivers consulting, technology and mission services to every major agency across the U.
• Government, defense and intelligence community.
• Our 30,000 experts extract the power of technology to create immediate value and deliver solutions at the edge of innovation.
• We operate across 30 countries worldwide, offering leading capabilities in digital modernization, AI/ML, Cloud, Cyber and application development.
• Together with our clients, we strive to create a safer, smarter world by harnessing the power of deep expertise and advanced technology.

• Strong interpersonal and communication skills and a willingness s to collaborate with different functional teams.
• (Plus) Experience with web development using Javascript and frameworks such Flask, Angular, ASP.
• Excellent problem-solving skills with the ability to thrive in a demanding, fast-paced work environment.

job_description:
• This enables us to remember your preferences (for example, your choice of language or region) or when you register on areas of the Sites, such as our web programs or extranets.
• Analyzing code for high performance CONV, GEMM and non-linear operators Deep understanding of AI frameworks, preferably ONNX.
• Practical experience applying these concepts to solve real-world problems in the context of research or work experience.
• You should have experience in optimizing and accelerating CNN/Generative AI models.
• Person needs excellent cross team collaboration skills to succeed in this role.
• We are looking for a candidate who possesses strong engineering skills to tackle complex challenges on AI model development work.
• Experience with any of the following also a plus: LLMs, stable diffusion, NeRF, or text-to-video generation.
• AMD Partner Hub Authorized Distributors AMD University Program Experience on model compression, quantization, and end-to-end inference optimization.
